sourcesContent:
To Do List

  • {{item.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'to-do-list'; list:any=[]=[]; addTask(item:string) { this.list.push({id:this.list.length,name:item}) console.warn(this.list); } removeTask(id:number) { console.warn(id); this.list=this.list.filter((item: { id: number; })=>item.id!==id) } }
